page.title: 14LIFE STYLES
page.content: Living in twentieth century Wath and surronding area is fairly comfortable.The housing is of a high standard and is both council and privately owned. Life carries on at a hectic pace and people are always striving to better their way of living.Many people have a car,Some have two.Likewises the same with televisions,many homes now have a second set.Personal computers are also very popular with about a third of the homes owning one. Many homes these days have either gas or electric central heating and some houses are double glazed.Also microwave ovens are becoming popular in homes_as a quick way to cook food. Many homes also have a pet of some kind,The most popular being dogs,cat,fish and budgies.
